oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Brief of defendants opposing plaintiff's motion for further relief, 1965 May 8
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Witt, Raymond B., 1915-2000; Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Chattanooga Board of Education's brief submitted to the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Tennessee, outlines reasons why the Chattanooga Board of Education opposes immediate and full desegregation as demanded by James Mapp and his NAACP attorney
